extendedInfo.description: Remote Call & SMS Tracker helps you to track your calls and SMS from anywhere. All you need to do is install this application and register with your Email Id and a 4 digit PIN. To track your calls and SMS, visit www.TrackMyPhones.com/cst/ and enter the registered Email ID and PIN and all the calls made/received and all the SMS sent/received after the "Call & SMS Tracker" application was installed can be viewed.You can choose to enable/disable tracking of calls or SMSes using check boxes available in the application. Also, you can enable location tracking which will show the location of your device when the call was made/received or when a SMS was sent/received.Few usecases of Call & SMS Tracker----------------------------------- Forgot your phone at home and you want to check the calls and SMS received, you can just login into www.TrackMyPhones.com/cst/ and get the details.- Lost your cell phone (or somebody stole it) and you want to see the calls made or SMS sent from your phone, you can do it from our website.- You want to keep an eye on your children, install the app in their phones.How it works------------- Install the app and register using an Email Id and PIN.- The Call/SMS/Location tracking is disabled by default. In the main view, enable the check boxes for Call and SMS. The next time a call is made or received, the call info is sent to the server. If an SMS is sent or received, the SMS info is sent to the server. The information is encrypted while transmitting and hence secure.- Log into our website www.TrackMyPhones.com/cst/ and enter Email Id and PIN and you can view the Calls and SMS.- You can choose to disable tracking info by unchecking the check boxes in the app- You can clear all the data stored in the server or delete your account by using the options menu- If you enable the âTrack Locationâ check box, then when a Call and SMS information is sent to the server, the location info, if available, is also sent. You can view the location from which the call was made/received and the SMS was sent/received.Permissions Used----------------1.	receive SMS and read SMS or MMSRequired to read sent and received SMS. The SMS is sent to server only when the "Track SMS" option is enabled in the app. The SMS info can be accessed only if the user enters the registered Email ID and PIN.2. intercept outgoing calls and read phone state and identityRequired to get the incoming/missed/outgoing call details. This info is gathered only if the "Track call" option is enabled in the app. The Call info can be accessed only if the user enters the registered Email ID and PIN.3. read contact dataRequired to map the phone number received during call or SMS to the person's name in the contact data.4. coarse/fine (network-based) location and view network stateRequired to collect location details of the device. The location details will be collected only if the user enables the âTrack Locationâ option in the main view of the app. The location info, along with the call and SMS info, can be viewed only by the user after providing the relevant credentials and hence is safe.DISCLAIMER:-----------By installing this app you approve that your Call/SMS/Location info can be sent to our server (www.TrackMyPhones.com/cst/) which is located in US and that you will not misuse this application to cause harm to any other Android users.Keywords: call tracker, sms tracker, call sms tracker, call tracer, sms tracer, tracker agent, tracer agent

reviews.title: Thanks a lot
reviews.comment: Everyone, try this app and rate it at the highest. This works perfect on my galaxy tab 2 and galaxy s3. Thank you very much and this helped me to solve my family problem. i owe this app a lot. thank you very much Trackerapps.

reviews.title: Works great but home icon should be hidden
reviews.comment: App does everything it says thats why I gave it 5 stars but has an icon.on the homepage which makes it clearly visible...I request app to be invisible unless in app management screen..this app actually helped my relationship as my girl kept randomly coming home later and later from work I thought she wss being unfaithful but it actually proved she was being forced to works late ..saving me from worry and suspsion and unneeded arguing...thx alot plz fix visibility issue and would be perfect
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beta version at best
reviews.comment: The application is poorly written with buggy interface, settings that do not save upon exit (location to be exact) and server updates are rarly of ever done.  I installed to test, no option to hide icon.  I called and texted phone several times, afterwords checking the website for results; the SMS texts were NEVER recorded.  The calls were, only without the location info and length of call.  I was sure to set phone to allow location tracking from cell tower. My overall opinion?  This is non working adware.
reviews.author: Emily waldrop
